questions.question: A compound is:
options: A pure substance made of two or more elements chemically combined
questions.correct: A pure substance made of two or more elements chemically combined

options: A combination of substances that are not chemically combined
questions.correct: A combination of substances that are not chemically combined

options: Compounds are chemically combined, mixtures are physically combined

questions.correct: Compounds are chemically combined, mixtures are physically combined

questions.question: What is plasma?
options: A state of matter with high energy

questions.question: What is the difference between mass and weight?
options: Mass is the amount of matter, weight is the force of gravity
Mass is the force of gravity, weight is the amount of matter

questions.correct: Mass is the amount of matter, weight is the force of gravity
